review: A rarity in today’s times… Dr Lalit is ************** patient, kind … he not only knows everything but also takes time to explain it… he examines the patient thoroughly and his diagnosis and treatment are very good. I highly recommend him.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
I recently underwent an ACL and meniscus tear surgery, performed by Dr. Lalit, and I would **highly** recommend trusting him for your care. From start to finish, the experience was as seamless as you can possibly make it. Everyone I came into contact with at his office and throughout my procedure were extremely competent, thorough, and professional. They went above and beyond in meeting my needs, both physically and in terms of paperwork.

Dr. Lalit has very quickly gained my trust, as well as that of my family & friends, both critical in this experience. A friend recommended Dr. Lalit, and he was able to fit me in for a quick appointment. From the experience of my friends before, and my initial interactions, I felt confident in the fact that Dr. Lalit had a conservative approach to care, and did not want to rush me to surgery.
   
After getting my MRI results, we confirmed it was a very serious tear, with high surgery potential. I kept delaying the surgery, in hopes that I may not need one. I had the opinion of one more doctor at AIIMS as well as medical friends, who supported Dr. Lalit’s evaluation. When the pain got unexpectedly worse, I got directly in touch with him, and he immediately scheduled me for an appointment and booked the procedure for the very next day. The surgery went extremely well.

I was walking the day of surgery again, the scar healed wonderfully, and 2 weeks later, I was back at work. I am incredibly thankful for how well taken care of and confident I felt during what could have been an extremely frightening experience. Thank you, Dr. Lalit.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
*** ***** ** *** **** * **** ******* *** also an amazing person. He is very calm and patient, explains everything which needs to be done. Too often surgeons suggest surgery as an instant fix for problems, but he was just the opposite. He is a very professional doctor and I would definitely recommend him.
He was extremely positive I would fully recover within 6-8 weeks and get back into my active lifestyle. He never gave me any longer-term daily medications. 
I could not stand the pain in my shoulders, and immediately, he gave a (if i am not mistaken) cortisone injection. He suggested that we get an MRI. The MRI report confirmed that this was a herniated disc in C4-C5, but it was very positive, he told me to keep taking my physical therapy sessions, and yeah, slowly, I started healing, and now I feel much better. 
His diagnosis, how he treated my case was unbelievable. He is doing such a good job.
I am getting close to getting my normal life back. By next month, I should get back into a routine at the gym.     
I feel no tingling feeling, and I am able to move my left arm correctly. My neck area stiffness feels actually less than before. Previously, I would get that burning feeling in my left shoulder constantly. I no longer feel like this. 
He even suggested the way I should sit, and worked on my sitting and sleeping posture. It has helped me out so much. Thank you so much doctor!

Awesome doctor , If you are facing any ortho related issues.You must consult him without a second though.I must say it's very rare to have such good doctors in this time.Always available digitally, continuous f/up.Words are less for him.You can trust the doctor without a second though.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I had really bad wrist injury after I fell from stairs, I went to my nearby hospital and they advised  me to go for surgery immediately, but I was apprehensive for the surgery. Then on online search I got to know about Dr Lalit, he saw my x-rays and advised me immobilization for few weeks and then started motion with electrotherapy. I am improving now with almost normal wrist without pain. And best part - no surgery. Thanks for guiding me and helping me out and providing with all options I had. Thanks

I visited the gleath clinic with one of my doctor friends, I play wrestling and had injury 8 month back for which I was operated in other hospital. I am doing my rehabilitation but my competition is coming in one week, so consulted GLEATH for return to wrestling inquiry and assessment. I am well built and I was confident that I am ready for joining competition, which I was being told at other centers. Dr Singh evaluated me keeping in my body demands. I was surprised to know my proprioceptive imbalance, my VMO weakness, my trunk sway, core weakness and dynamic muscle imbalance. This type of assessment I have not seen anywhere and I am lucky and satisfied that I went there. Now I am with Dr Singh and team to improve and get ready for my game in such short period. My advice to all athletes, if you want to go back to your sports and worried just visit once at GLEATH. Thanks a lot Dr Singh..

I've been so apprehensive of doctors lately since i tore my ACL, MCL and miniscus in the right knee while playing sports 6 months ago. 
I came for an examination because i recently had an impact injury again and was worried that I've retorn something. Especially ACL. 

He did such a thorough examination. Gave so much time listening to the history of my joint/bone injuries. And after all of that, he was happy to tell me that i am good to go.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: * **** **** ************* ****** *** explains the problems and remedies. Visited Dr. Lalit today for sprain in wrist. He not only consulted and prescribed medicines but also gave a therapy session for pain. He listened patiently and gave enough time to examine and understand my problem.  I must recommend him for his calm, friendly and knowledgeable treatment.  He doesn't write too much of medicines and is always available for guidance whenever needed.

I visited many orthopedic and physiotherapists but was told to rest for long, even after rest I was not advised on running. Lastly, I went to gleath and consulted Dr Lalit Joon, he assessed me and give proper time frame with rest mixed with controlled training and I was able to get through my physicals because of them. Happy and suggest completely for sports related any queries or treatment. Unique actually. Thanks...

My heel pain was so worse I couldn’t take even one step in morning, leave alone wearing heels and shoes I wanted to office. Dr Lalit Joon gave me SHOCKWAVE THERAPY FOR five sessions and I am starting to feel difference. Many thanks to Dr Lalit for listening to me so patiently and this shock wave therapy doing wonders for me.

A rarity in today’s times… Dr Lalit is ************** patient, kind … he not only knows everything but also takes time to explain it… he examines the patient thoroughly and his diagnosis and treatment are very good. I highly recommend him.

I am having neck pain which was diagnosed as cervical pain long back ago but it was not cured as I have to use pain medicine every day. I paid a visit to gleath centre which cures sports injuries and orthopaedic conditions. With two visits only I am feeling better and free of taking medicine every day. They advised me specific exercises and postural correction for me, and hoping to get fully cured in due time. Excellent place to visit. Thanks to Dr Lalit Joon and team..

I visited GLEATH sports injuries and orthopaedic centre green park, after learning that they are providing free consultation on Sunday in march. I had low back ache for which I have visited multiple orthopaedic centre and physiotherapists but my pain was there after short time relief. I am happy that I visited gleath because they give you in depth education about your condition and treatment is innovative and revolutionary. Very thankful to GLEATH TEAM OF DOCTORS.

I visited Gleath sports injuries centre in green park for my ankle sprain. I had great experience talking to Dr Lalit Joon and his team who understood my condition well and make me under stand what to do and not to do for my injury. Elsewhere I was advised to go for surgery for which I was very apprehensive. At GLEATH their dedicated sports medicine team gave me confidence to get back to my running career, which was awesome for me. Thanks Dr Lalit.

Dr Lalit is an amazing doctor - most kind and attentive. He administered some vibrating therapy and it gave me instant relief. After 10 days of daily therapy and physiotherapy at his clinic, I was completely pain free. I was suffering from acute back pain. Like I couldn't even move and the pain meds weren't helping either. And I knew it had happened due to really bad posture - sitting on bed with bent back while working on the laptop.He doesn't rush, unlike a lot of other doctors, but actually made visible efforts to make sure that I get better. Thank you so much doctor. Would 100% recommend everyone to see him with any kind of orthopedic issue.

Gleath sports injuries centre have provided me with confidence of playing again after my Hamstring injury. I am sprinter and hurt my Hamstring badly and took consultation from many specialists. But sports medicine knowledge and understanding of every game and mechanism of injury they have at GLEATH is best to none. I am thankful to Gleath sports injuries and orthopedic centre for their support and making me believe that there is someone who is dedicated for their sports injuries under one roof. My advice to all sportspersons is that if you have sports injuries, no need to run around in hope of treatment, once visit Gleath and feel the difference yourself.
Very good experience while visiting Dr Lalit. He found and explained the issue, and provided the right guidance. I will definitely come back when required.

review: Thank you so much for giving the best medical care, you helped ease my knee pain... The treatment you gave me increased the chances of me getting well,. I cannot thank you enough for the excellent care you have provided. God bless !
Dr. Bhim was really helpful. Appreciate is patience. A detailed explanation was provided on my injury along with a remedy. Thank you !

** ***** **** ** *** ** *** **** ********** **** ** ***** ********* ** ****** ******** *** ***** *** **. I was suffering from tennis elbow in my right hand for a long time, nobody told me the modifications I need to do for prevention and decrease incidence of this condition in future as Dr Lalit Joon did. I am grateful to him and appreciate his clinical acumen and dedication towards his patients.
I had ankle pain for which I consulted Dr lalit, I am feeling much better now.. thanks doctor Lalit.
